step.name: Sakura
step.tutorial: One of the things you have to do when you enter Sakura's school is defeat the Yakuza leader. When you enter the Yakuza office, you will later see two men wearing black clothes. Then, kill all the members there as well as the leader. Then, you will find weapons and money in the building. Remember, you have to kill all the members, otherwise they will keep following you.

step.name: Completing Missions
step.tutorial: There are several missions that must be completed within the allotted time. Some of the missions that must be completed are: Chinese character (8:40-9:30): go to class 1-1 and wait for the teacher to finish teaching. English (9:40-10:30): still in the same class and wait until the lesson is over. PC (14:10-15:00): Go to the computer room which is on the second floor on the left, then sit down and complete the mission. Monkfish: Head to the second floor of the school on the left and enter the last class. Marathon (10:40-11:30): run a marathon by going to the marathon track behind the school. Then, don't forget to change into sports clothes. Ballet (11:40-12:30): go to the gym and change into ballet clothes. Spin through the pink ring.

step.name: Getting Money from NPC
step.tutorial: You will also make friends with NPCs, such as parents at school, salesmen, or drivers. After befriending them, you can ask for some money and they will give you 1,000 to 2,000 Yen. So, it is very important to maintain a relationship with the NPC. In fact, if you need to make it as your character's lover.

step.name: Escape from Police
step.tutorial: When you are being chased by the police, the most effective way is to stand behind other officers. That way, the police will shoot each other.

step.name: How to Earn Money
step.tutorial: Apart from making friends with NPCs, you can earn money just by exploring the city. Later, you will find the money lying around. You can also find money in other children's houses.

step.name: Always Shower
step.tutorial: Don't forget to always go home and take a shower to maintain your character's reputation. What are you waiting for? Immediately download Sakura School Simulator and customize your character the way you want. You can also create characters in the game to get married and have children.
